[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Arrange to mass bosses, killing them as a group.

**Usage**

- `/mass monster:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `monster` | `string` | Yes | The boss you want to mass. | - |

**Examples**

- `/mass name:General graardor`
